data.name: SPLIT BULLET Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
About the original game

http://store.steampowered.com/app/449450
SPLIT BULLET is a game all about 'splitting up' a massive crowd of enemies—yes, those polygons—crawling towards you. Don't let 'em get you and survive as long as you can, by using your instincts and weapons.

Features:

  • Minimalistic game design
  • Insane amount of enemies coming out from all sides
  • Massive amount of bullets splitting around everywhere
  • Various weapons to choose from, and multiple stages for you to tackle
  • Test your limit in Endless Mode!


About the Game

Original score from the game 'SPLIT BULLET'. Composed by 'CH3OH'. 12+5 tracks total, full length of 25:31. Provided in 320kbps MP3 file format.

Tracklist

  • 01. Bad Squraes (01:00)
  • 02. Hexagonal (00:54)
  • 03. Hyper Spin (01:00)
  • 04. Trianglism (00:42)
  • 05. Geometry (00:53)
  • 06. Twins (00:48)
  • 07. Surface (00:54)
  • 08. Time (01:06)
  • 09. Space (01:06)
  • 10. Reverse (01:06)
  • 11. Main Menu Theme (03:04)
  • 12. Trailer Theme (01:42)

Bonus Tracks

  • 13. Geometry Witch (02:48)
  • 14. Insane Race (02:54)
  • 15. The Purple (02:06)
  • 16. Another World (01:30)
  • 17. Breaking Apart (01:48)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any operating system that supports the MP3 file format
  • Processor: Any normally functioning CPUs
  • Graphics: Not required
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in sound chipset
